Title: Flight 1
Plot: Paul hosts a party at his apartment and introduces someone special to his Sterling Cooper colleagues. Peggy visits her family for dinner. Despite a conflict of interest, the Sterling Cooper agency aggressively pursues an airline account and Duck attempts to appeal to the client using an unorthodox approach.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Mark Moses, Joel Murray, Anne Dudek, Kristoffer Polaha
